title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not receive focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not receive focus.
EB: When clicking on the first Combo, it should receive focus.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog.
2. Press the "Tab" key to navigate to the next field.
3. The focus should move to the second Combo labeled "Repository Path:".
